channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump's economic doom loop
item.description: President Trump's attempt to rebrand the One Big, Beautiful Bill Act can't mask a grim reality: His economic approval is collapsing, and the data unde...

item.title: Blue states mount vaccine defense against RFK Jr.
item.description: Blue states are quickly moving to defy Health Secretary Robert F. Kennedy Jr.'s vaccine restrictions, increasing the likelihood of a patchwork of conf...

item.title: Pentagon: 2 Venezuelan planes flew near U.S. Navy ships in "provocative move"
item.description: Two Venezuelan military aircraft flew near a U.S. Navy ship in international waters in a "highly provocative move" on Thursday, the Pentagon said. The...

item.title: Winklevoss twins join the GOP's crypto megadonor set
item.description: There's a new megadonor force in Republican politics: the crypto-mogul Winklevoss twins . Why it matters: Cameron and Tyler Winklevoss, 44, are part o...

item.title: Zuckerberg, Gates and Altman lavish praise on Trump at dinner
item.description: President Trump hosted the elite of Big Tech at a White House dinner Thursday evening, including Meta's Mark Zuckerberg and Microsoft's Bill Gates — a...

item.title: How Stephen Miller is running Trump’s effort to take over D.C.
item.description: The deputy White House chief of staff has emerged as a key enforcer of the D.C. operation in the month since Trump federalized the local police depart...

item.title: Appeals court keeps pause on order limiting National Guard actions in L.A.
item.description: The three-judge panel agreed to maintain an existing pause on a lower court order.

item.title: Trump administration to help share new HIV drug with impacted nations
item.description: The plan to target pregnant and breastfeeding mothers will be administered through PEPFAR. Critics said it appeared to sidestep LGBTQ+ people.

item.title: Biden undergoes surgery to remove skin cancer lesions
item.description: Former president Joe Biden underwent a procedure that involves cutting away layers of skin until there are no longer signs of cancer, his spokesperson...

item.title: Trump administration to end European security programs focused on Russia
item.description: The decision, affecting hundreds of millions of dollars in U.S. military aid, has alarmed NATO allies and upset U.S. lawmakers who strongly back the a...

item.title: Former Trump statistics chief slams Friday firing of Erika McEntarfer
item.description: Bill Beach said the president's suggestions that the jobs report was rigged betrayed a misunderstanding in how those numbers are assembled.

item.title: Trump fires statistics chief after soft jobs report
item.description: The monthly jobs report showed just 73,000 jobs in July, with big reductions to May's and June's numbers

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
